resources.string:
XEmu65 (C) 2017-2018 Michał Galiński.
Atari800 (C) David Firth, (C) Atari800 Development Team.
Based on official port of Atari800 for Android by Kostas Nakos.
Atari ROM and Atari BASIC replacements by Avery Lee.
Licensed under GNU General Public License.
This app is not affiliated or endorsed by Atari Inc.
You have to grant the Storage permission to access files on your device. Please enable the permission in Application settings.

Please consider that this app is free.
If you appreciate my work, please leave a rating on Google Play.
If you've found a bug or have a question, please drop me an e-mail.

Thanks!
To improve compatiblity, you can use original Atari ROMs. XEmu65 can scan your Downloads directory for xf25.zip file that you need to manually download from the Internet.
